articles.title: We need this in South Africa! Ford turns its 2022 Expedition SUV into the ultimate camper van - News24
articles.description: The Blue Oval has created a one-of-a-kind Expedition for SEMA, which we think is just the type of Ford product we need the company to launch in Mzansi.
articles.content:
• OEM-commissioned self-sustaining motor home based on the 2022 Ford Expedition SUV.
  • Raised ride height, fitted with special Fox Racing shocks and General Grabber tyres.
